Transport data

Transport data include traffic flow, traffic network and travellers datasets.

Traffic network data

Popular datasets consist of:

  • Network data
  • Land use data
  • Level of service data

Other new datasets such as people's posts on facebook, or twitters

Travel survey

Househoulds, persons, and trips

Road safety data

UK Road Safety Data https://data.gov.uk/dataset/cb7ae6f0-4be6-4935-9277-47e5ce24a11f/road-safety-data

Traffic count

Traffic Count Locations

https://discover.data.vic.gov.au/dataset/traffic-count-locations

Traffic Signal Volume Data https://discover.data.vic.gov.au/dataset/traffic-signal-volume-data

Victorian Crash Statistics https://www.spatialvision.com.au/crashstats/
